LanguageData.FedSuit.label: Federation jumpsuit
LanguageData.FedSuit.description: A carbon crystalline fiber jumpsuit for military personnel. It is light and thin, but surprisingly sturdy. It is the uniform of the Federation.
LanguageData.Apparel_Judicator.label: riot gear
LanguageData.Apparel_Judicator.description: A "Judicator" riot gear was produced by Arms Dynamics for the creepy Federation Peacekeeper. This is a really great personal armor if you can withstand from scornful eyes of the people.
LanguageData.Apparel_JudicatorH.label: riot gear helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_JudicatorH.description: It is a helmet of the FPC riot gear. If you wear this, you will be an eyesore of your colony.
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGear.label: marksman gear
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGear.description: Arms Dynamics "Condemner" Marksman gear. With joint stabilizer unit, this outfit assure steady aim. Standard issue gear of the Federation Peacebringer assassin corps.
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGearH.label: marksmangear helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_MarksmanGearH.description: It is a helmet of the "Condemner" marksman gear. Integrated target spotter guarantees high accuracy and fast reaction.
